data.title: Great Find in Downtown Canton
data.text: While in town for a meeting we came across this restaurant which was advertising southern and creole cuisine.  Service was prompt and friendly.  Every thing we had was excellent - gumbo, blackened salmon, and jambalaya.  The fried chicken at the next table looked great.  Also enjoyed the sweet potato bar for dessert.  Parking was easy right in front of the restaurant.  We will definitely eat here again when next in town.

data.title: Relaxed atmosphere...great food.
data.text: I love it here...my wife amd I can relax, and enjoy in a trendy, hip place right downtown.  The food is great (chicken and waffles, and the wings especially).

data.title: Great food and atomosphere
data.text: Great food. Entertainment is always enjoyable here as well. Plenty of great food choices. The mac N cheese is my favorite.

data.title: "Southern Meal in Ohio"
data.text: Visiting Canton, OH not sure what to expect.  Wanted to try something near my hotel that wasn't fast food.  I actually stumbled upon Marques and went in with reservations.  The jazz music playing pecked my interest.  The host was kind and pleasant to speak with.  I went back to hotel and brought 15 others with me on this journey.  I can honestly say the food was wonderful.  My husband enjoyed the Pork Chop smothered, my friend LL enjoyed the Jambalaya, my Godmother enjoyed the grilled Chicken Breast, I enjoyed the Fish of the Day "New Orleans Swai" with crawfish sauce and the kids enjoyed the chicken tenders, hamburger, and mac and Cheese.  After eating that my taste buds wanted to try more and the desserts well lets just say they did not disappointment.  If you have an opportunity to visit Canton, OH you would not be disappointed when the jazz music and Southern & Creole food.  Mr. Marques' was enjoyed by visitors from Virginia.

data.title: Hot Dam This Is Great!!!
data.text: Southern food with a modern twist!!!  OMG you have got to try this place out.  These people love what they do and it shows.  Great food!!! Jambalaya, Ribs, A Potato Salad that will leave you craving more, Waffles & Chicken and a double OMG, save room for the Sweet Potato Bread Pudding!!! I know they put love into there food but I tell you they must be putting something else in as well because I am addicted to there food!!!  When people love what they do it shows and this is one of the best shows in town!!!! Great Food, Great Atmosphere, Great Staff and fair prices!!!

data.title: HORRIBLE
data.text: The food looked like slop on a plate....The chicken was fried in OLD OIL coupled with the fact that the batter had rosemary in it.....DON'T MESS WITH TRADITIONAL SOUTHERN FRIED CHICKEN by using rosemary.....rosemary with roasted potatoes or baked chicken yes....but NEVER WITH FRIED CHICKEN.  The macaroni and cheese had NO CREAM BASE at all (melted cheese and butter on macaroni).  My drink was served in a dirty glass with a chipped rim.  THIS IS NOT FINE DINING!  It saddens me because I always support minority businesses, but I will never accept mediocre service from any business.  I work hard for my money and if you want to earn my business, you should do the same....

data.title: BEAUTIFUL
data.text: Marques has a very nice atmosphere with a friendly owner who spoke to us personally.  The food varies from soul food to steaks.

data.title: Not a First Timer
data.text: Wonderful atmosphere and food offerings especially on Sunday,,,we tried a Friday evening about 3 weeks ago, Marque let's tighten up the Friday evening, your food was more like average on Friday ,,,,,(get those rolls in order) we will be back ..
